comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: They seem to be filling in Darling Harbour (for rail yards?). The steam tipper lorry could be a 1920s Sentinel. Grab your anorak and have a ride on one - youtu.be/JKwiz0x4fLg - side view at 4:45 - not a 100% match - steam enthusiast knowledge required

comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] Well-found. That was an exciting ride beachcomber!
